data.name: AboutMenuOption
data.comment: The application bar menu option to bring up the YLAD dialogue

data.name: AcknowledgementsLeader
data.value: The author would like to acknowledge the following people and organisations who provided either inspiration or some great tips and code snippets on the Internet that were used within this app.
data.comment: Text shown at the top of the acknowledgements page

data.name: AddLevelAfter
data.comment: Context menu option in GameEditor to insert a new level after this one

data.name: AddLevelBefore
data.comment: Context menu option in GameEditor to insert a new level before this one

data.name: AddLevelDefinitionPageTitle
data.comment: Page title for LevelEditor when creating a new level

data.name: AddNewPlayerTitle
data.comment: Page title for the screen allowing a new player to be created

data.name: AddPlayer
data.comment: Application bar button label for adding a new player

data.name: AppendLevelButton
data.comment: GameEditor add level application bar button

data.name: ApplicationName
data.comment: The title of the application

data.name: AuthorName
data.comment: GameEditor prompt for author name

data.name: Autosolve
data.comment: Application Bar icon to automatically solve the puzzle

data.name: Back
data.comment: The word"back", used to indicate that an interaction will go back through the app

data.name: Cancel
data.comment: Application bar button label for cancelling the creation of a new player

data.name: CannotDeleteReadOnlyGameTemplateText
data.value: built-in game template "{0}" cannot be deleted
data.comment: Text for message indicating that a built-in game template cannot be deleted

data.name: CannotDeleteReadOnlyGameTemplateTitle
data.comment: Title for message indicating that a built-in game template cannot be deleted

data.name: ConfirmDeleteGameTemplateText
data.value: are you sure you want to delete game template "{0}"?
data.comment: Text for message asking user to confirm that a game template should be deleted

data.name: ConfirmDeleteGameTemplateTitle
data.comment: Title for message asking user to confirm that a game template should be deleted

data.name: ConfirmDiscardGameChangesText
data.value: are you sure you want to discard your changes to this level?
data.comment: GameEditor message box text when the user might discard changes

data.name: ConfirmDiscardGameChangesTitle
data.comment: GameEditor message box title when the user might discard changes

data.name: Continue
data.comment: The word "continue", to indicate that an interaction will continue to the next logical part of the application

data.name: ContinueGame
data.comment: Menu item title for continuing the current game

data.name: ContinueGameDescription
data.comment: Menu item description for continuing the current game

data.name: CreateGameTemplate
data.comment: Application bar icon in GameTemplateSelector to create a new one

data.name: CreateLevel
data.comment: Page title for the create level page

data.name: Custom
data.comment: Indicates a custom game

data.name: CustomDescription
data.value: edit or create your own game templates
data.comment: Describes a custom game

data.name: CustomDifficulty
data.comment: The name given for a difficulty which isn't registered as Easy, Medium or Hard

data.name: CustomGameContextMenuCopy
data.comment: Context menu option to clone a game template

data.name: CustomGameContextMenuDelete
data.comment: Label on the custom game context menu to delete the game

data.name: DefaultGameTemplateTitle
data.comment: The name given to a game template that isn't assigned a title by the user

data.name: DefaultLevelText
data.comment: Default level text for a newly created level

data.name: DefaultLevelTitle
data.comment: The default new level title

data.name: DefaultPlayerName
data.comment: The name of the player created when the game is first run

data.name: DeleteConfirmationMessage
data.value: {0} has {1} save game(s). Click OK to delete all these games as well as the player record, or cancel to abort the operation
data.comment: Description for confirmation dialogue box asking for confirmation of player delete when they have save games

data.name: DeleteConfirmationTitle
data.comment: Title for confirmation dialogue box asking for confirmation of player delete when they have save games

data.name: DeleteLevel
data.comment: Context menu option in GameEditor to delete the currently selected level

data.name: Easy
data.comment: Indicates an easy difficulty game

data.name: EditLevel
data.comment: Page title for editing an existing level page

data.name: EditLevelDefinitionPageTitle
data.comment: Page title for LevelEditor when editing an existing level

data.name: EditPlayerTitle
data.comment: Page title for the PlayerEditor.xaml page when an existing player is being edited

data.name: EndGameMessage
data.value: Congratulations! You've completed the single player game in a total of {0} using {1} moves, which places you {2} on the high score table. Times for each level are shown below.
data.comment: Message shown in EndGame.xaml

data.name: EndGameTitle
data.comment: Title of the GameEnd page

data.name: GameDescription
data.value: start a game using a {0} x {1} grid
data.comment: Describes an easy, medium or hard game

data.name: GameDescriptionHighScoreItem
data.comment: The game description given for each game in the high score table

data.name: GameEditorPageTitle
data.comment: Page title for GameEditor

data.name: GameName
data.comment: GameEditor prompt for game name

data.name: GamePageTitle
data.comment: The title displayed on the GamePage.xaml main page (this will be the number of the level)

data.name: GameTemplateCopyTitle
data.comment: The title given to a game template that has been cloned

data.name: GameTemplateSelectorTitle
data.comment: Title for the game template selector menu page

data.name: GoToHighScores
data.comment: Shown on the application menu bar to navigate to the high score table

data.name: Hard
data.comment: Indicates a hard difficulty game

data.name: HighScorePageTitle
data.comment: Page title for the high score table

data.name: HighScoreStats
data.comment: Used on the high score table, this is the string shown beneath each player name containing the stats of their game (number of moves and elapsed time)

data.name: ImageAreaChooserTitle
data.comment: Page title for the image area chooser

data.name: ImageChooserTitle
data.comment: Page title for Image Chooser

data.name: ImageTextLabel
data.comment: Label on the level editor to edit the image text

data.name: ImageTitleLabel
data.comment: Label on level editor to edit the image title

data.name: LevelByLabel
data.comment: Used on GamePage level start screen to indicate who the image for the level was created by

data.name: LevelFinishedCaption
data.comment: The caption on the message box displayed when a player completes a level

data.name: LevelFinishedMessage
data.value: Congratulations! You have completed level {0} in a total of {1} using {2} {3}.
data.comment: The message text displayed when a player completes a level

data.name: LevelLabel
data.comment: Prompt on the screen for which level number this is

data.name: LevelList
data.comment: GameEditor prompt for level list

data.name: LicenceUriLabel
data.comment: Label on the level editor to more license information o

data.name: LicenseLabel
data.comment: Label on level editor to change image license label

data.name: LittleWatson_Message
data.value: A problem occurred the last time you ran this application. Would you like to send an email to report it?
data.comment: Message shown by LittleWatson to the user when starting up and a crash file was detected

data.name: LittleWatson_Title
data.comment: Title of Little Watson problem report MessageBox

data.name: LoadGame
data.comment: Menu item title for loading a saved game

data.name: LoadGameDescription
data.comment: Menu item description for loading a saved game

data.name: LocalPictures
data.comment: Prompt for using pictures on the local device (your phone)

data.name: LocalPicturesDescription
data.value: use a picture on your phone
data.comment: Description for prompt for using pictures on the local device (your phone)

data.name: MainMenu
data.comment: Main menu page title

data.name: Medium
data.comment: Indicates a medium difficulty game

data.name: MoveLevelDown
data.comment: Context menu on game editor to move a level down in the order

data.name: MoveLevelUp
data.comment: Context menu on game editor to move a level up in the order

data.name: MovesInLabel
data.comment: Used on HighScores.xaml to separate the number of moves and elapsed time

data.name: MovesLabel
data.comment: Prompt on the main game screen for how many moves the player has taken on this level so far

data.name: NewGame
data.comment: Menu item title for starting a new game

data.name: NewGameDescription
data.comment: Menu item description for starting a new game

data.name: NoHighScoresFound
data.comment: text shown where there are no high scores

data.name: NoSavedGamesFound
data.comment: Message displayed when no saved games exist on the SavedGameSelector page

data.name: Pause
data.comment: Application bar text for button that pauses a running game

data.name: PausedMessage
data.comment: The message shown overlaid on the puzzle when paused (stops the user considering the puzzle)

data.name: PlayerContextMenuDelete
data.comment: Context menu option on player selector to delete the player

data.name: PlayerContextMenuEdit
data.comment: Context menu option on player selector to edit the player

data.name: Resume
data.comment: Application bar text for button that resumes a paused game

data.name: SaveGameLevelTitle
data.comment: Title for a save game item in the save game selector page

data.name: SaveGameSelectorDeleteGame
data.comment: The context menu header for the option to delete a previously saved game

data.name: SaveGameSelectorPageTitle
data.comment: Page title for the save game selector page

data.name: SaveGameTemplateButton
data.comment: Application button to save the game template on the GameEditor

data.name: SaveLevel
data.comment: LevelEditor application bar button label to save the level

data.name: SavePlayer
data.comment: Application bar button label for saving a new player

data.name: ScramblerType_Identity
data.comment: Scramble type

data.name: ScramblerType_OneMoveToFinish
data.comment: Scramble type

data.name: ScramblerType_Random
data.comment: Scramble type

data.name: ScramblerType_XFlip
data.comment: Scramble type

data.name: ScramblerType_XYFlip
data.comment: Scramble type

data.name: ScramblerType_YFlip
data.comment: Scramble type

data.name: SelectCustomGamePageName
data.comment: Page title for the SelectCustomPage page

data.name: SelectImageButton
data.comment: Button on AddEditLevelDefition to select an image to use for a puzzle

data.name: SelectLicense
data.comment: Select license applicaiton bar button label on the level editor

data.name: SelectPlayer
data.comment: Select player page screen title

data.name: SettingsMenuOption
data.comment: Application bar option for configuration of application settings

data.name: SinglePlayerGameTitle
data.comment: The name for the default game

data.name: SinglePlayerTitle
data.comment: ImageTitle of the page for single players

data.name: StartLevelPrompt
data.comment: The prompt to the user on GamePage to start the level

data.name: StartNextLevelPrompt
data.comment: The prompt to the user to continue

data.name: TimeLabel
data.comment: Label on the main game screen indicating the amount of time the player has been on this level

data.name: UnnamedPlayer
data.comment: The name given to a player where the player name has been set to an empty string
